---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
df <- data.frame(x = (3:12) * 5,
             y = c((1:6) , (5:2)))
             
test <- approx(df$x, df$y, seq(1, 50, by = 0.5))

```

```{r}
plot(df$x, df$y)
points(test$x, test$y, col ='red', cex = 0.5)
```


# Alternate Rules for outside of data
```{r}
test <- approx(df$x, df$y, seq(1, 50, by = 0.5), rule = 2)

plot(df$x, df$y)
points(test$x, test$y, col ='red', cex = 0.5)
```

```{r}
test <- approx(df$x, df$y, seq(1, 50, by = 0.5), yleft = 2)

plot(df$x, df$y)
points(test$x, test$y, col ='red', cex = 0.5)
```


# Method = 'Constant'
```{r}
test <- approx(df$x, df$y, seq(1, 50, by = 0.5), method = 'constant', f = 0)

plot(df$x, df$y)
points(test$x, test$y, col ='red', cex = 0.5)
```

```{r}
test <- approx(df$x, df$y, seq(1, 50, by = 0.5), method = 'constant', f = .5)

plot(df$x, df$y)
points(test$x, test$y, col ='red', cex = 0.5)
```
